wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
*'''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast]].
*'''[[12 January|12]]''' - Actress [[Elizabeth Moody]] dies.
*'''[[13 January|13]]''' - ''The Power of Tolkien's Prose: Middle-Earth's Magical Style'' by Steve Walker is published.
*'''[[18 January|18]]''' - ''[[Mirkwood: A Novel About JRR Tolkien]]'' by [[Steve Hillard]] is released.
*'''[[20 January|20]]''' - [[Cubicle 7 Entertainment]] announces the forth-coming release of ''[[The One Ring: The Lord of the Rings Role-playing Game]]''.
*'''?''' - [[Amon Hen 221]] is published.

==February==
*'''[[12 February|12]]''' - ''[[A Tolkien English Glossary]]'' is published.
==March==
*'''[[1 March|1]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Pocket Guide]]'' is published.
*'''[[1 March|1]]''' - ''Oliphaunt Limited Edition Poster'' is published.
*'''[[1 March|1]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]: [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood#Volume III: Allies of the King|Volume III: Allies of the King]]'', "Oath of the Rangers" is released.
*'''[[4 March|4]]''' - ''[[The History of Middle-earth]]'' is re-released in hardcover.
*'''[[6 March|6]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s [[Smials#In real world|Smials]] Day in [[Leeds]].
*'''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
*'''?''' - [[Amon Hen 222]] is published.

==April==
*'''[[1 April|1]]''' - ''[[The Legend of Sigurd and Gudrún]]'' is released in paperback.
*'''[[1 April|1]]''' - ''[[West of the Mountains, East of the Sea]]'' is published.
*'''[[17 April|17]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] holds its AGM in Brighton, UK.
*'''[[17 April|17]]''' - ''Tolkien Enterprises'' change it's name to ''[[Middle-earth Enterprises]]''.
*'''[[21 April|21]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth Minstrel]]'' is published.
*'''[[23 April|23]]''' - [[Bo Hansson]], famous for his music inspired by ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', dies.
*'''[[23 April|23]] - [[25 April|25]]''' - [[Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V.|DTG]]'s Tolkien Seminar 2010.
*'''[[26 April|26]]''' - [[Simon Tolkien]] publishes the article "[[In My Grandfather's Footsteps]]".

==May==
*'''[[5 May|5]]''' - The ''[[wikipedia:America's Next Top Model|America's Next Top Model]]'' episode "[[Hobbits vs. Models]]" premieres on [[wikipedia:The CW Television Network|The CW]].
*'''[[15 May|15]] - [[16 May|16]]''' - Middle-earth Weekend, Sarehole Mill, [[Birmingham]].
*'''[[22 May|22]]''' - "Tolkien and Philosophy" seminar in Modena, Italy.
*'''[[28 May|28]]''' - Scholar [[Alexei Kondratiev]] dies.
*'''[[30 May|30]]''' - [[Guillermo del Toro]] departs from [[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit film]] adaptation.
*'''?''' - [[Amon Hen 223]] is published.

==June==
*'''[[9 June|9]]''' - [[Midway Games]] is closed, because of bankruptcy.
*'''[[22 June|22]]''' - The [[RiffTrax]] commentary of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' is released online.
*'''[[26 June|26]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s Northern Hemisphere seminar: "Tolkien & [[Birmingham]]".
*'''26 - [[27 June|27]]''' - Danish Society's Bree Summer Banquet.

==July==
*'''[[8 July|8]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2011]]'' is published.
*'''[[15 July|15]]-[[18 July|18]]''' - [[Tolkien Thing]] 2010.
*'''[[16 July|16]]-[[19 July|19]]''' - [[Mythcon 41]] in Dallas, Texas.
*'''?''' - [[Amon Hen 224]] is published.

==August==
*'''[[3 August|3]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game]]'' is announced.
*'''[[13 August|13]]-[[16 August|16]]''' - [[Edge of the Wild (Tolkien art exhibit)|"Edge of the Wild"]], Tolkien art exhibition in Moreton-in-Marsh.
*'''[[28 August|28]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s Southern Hemisphere seminar: "Tolkien's Odysseys - Middle-earth and Beyond"
*'''early''' - ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 7]]'' is published.

==September==
*'''[[2 September|2]]''' - ''[[There and Back Again: The Map of Tolkien's The Hobbit]]'' is published.
*'''[[8 September|8]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online|The Lord of the Rings Online:]] [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood#Volume III: Allies of the King|Volume III: Allies of the King]]'', "Ride of the Grey Company" is released in North America, which includes free to play for current and former subscribers.
*'''[[10 September|10]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' goes free to play for the general public in North America.
*'''10 - [[12 September|12]]''' - Bulgarian Tolkien Society's 6th Tolkien-Fest in Sofia.
*'''[[14 September|14]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]'' is released in North America.
*'''[[24 September|24]]-[[26 September|26]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2010]] at Lady Margaret Hall.
*'''24-26''' - Lasse Lanta Autumn Meeting of Austrian Tolkien Society.
*'''[[26 September|26]]''' - Decentennial Celebration and Hobbit Birthdays, [[North East Tolkien Society]]
*'''[[28 September|28]]''' - ''[[The Music of the Lord of the Rings Films]]'' is published.
*'''[[30 September|30]] - [[3 October|Oct. 3]]''' - Jubilee for [[Mithlond, Göteborgs Tolkiensällskap|Mithlond]], the Gothenburg Tolkien Society of Sweden.
*'''?''' - [[Amon Hen 225]] is published.

==October==
*'''[[1 October|1]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth: Visions of a Modern Myth]]'' by [[Donato Giancola]] is published.
*'''[[6 October|6]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]'' is released in [[Australia]].
*'''[[9 October|9]] - [[11 October|11]]''' - Chilean Tolkien Society's Mereth Oronnad.
*[[10 October|10]] - [[Minecraft Middle-Earth]] begins building.
*'''[[15 October|15]]''' – [[Peter Jackson]] is officially announced as the director of [[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit film series]].
*'''[[19 October|19]]''' - ''[[The Dragon's Apprentice]]'' is published.
*'''[[25 October|25]]''' – German translator [[Walter Scherf]] dies.
*'''[[29 October|29]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest]]'' is released in Europe.
*'''29 - [[1 November|1 Nov.]]''' - Mereth Aderthad/EstelConXVI Annual Convention of the Spanish Tolkien Society in Valenica, [[Spain]].
*'''[[30 October|30]]''' - ''[[Looking for the King|Looking for the King: An Inklings Novel]]'' is published.

==November==
*'''[[2 November|2]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online|The Lord of the Rings Online:]] [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood#Volume III: Allies of the King|Volume III: Allies of the King]]'', "Ride of the Grey Company" is released in Europe.
*'''[[2 November|2]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' goes free-to-play for the general public in Europe.
*'''[[3 November|3]]''' - Author [[Glen GoodKnight]] dies.
*'''[[15 November|15]]''' - [[Parma Eldalamberon 19|''Parma Eldalamberon'', issue 19]] is published.
*'''?''' - [[Amon Hen 226]] is published.
*'''?''' - [[The Lord of the Rings Online#Update 1: Journey to Winter-Home|Update 1: Journey to Winter-Home]], the first update of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'', is released.

==December==
*'''[[1 December|1]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth and Beyond|Middle-earth and Beyond: Essays on the World of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
*'''?''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Christian Encounters)]]'' is published.

==?==
*'''(spring/summer)''' - ''[[Mythlore 109/110]]'' is published.
*'''(spring)''' - [[Mallorn 49|''Mallorn'' 49]] is published.
*'''(autumn)''' - [[Mallorn 50|''Mallorn'' 50]] is published.
